website_summaries.verdict: Good quality of martial arts shoes. Comfortable design as they do not require lacing up.
pros: Should last a while, as these shoes contain extra stitching in the stress points
Does not require any laces to wear, as they feature a slip-on design with synthetic leather that will flex for a good workout result
Rubbery sole gives you a good grip on the floor
cons: Some athletes won't like the slight heel on the shoe
Made more for a light martial arts workout

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: My husband got these for me for karate class. I love the support in the arches, great for my plantar fasciitis. And that's the reason this got a 3. They run big for their size, so they are a little loose, but I can handle that. What upsets me is the fact that after the first use, the sole came off of one of the shoes.... And I was teaching the younger ones in class, not participating except to show how the moves were done. So, very poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: muddymomm

customer_reviews.title: you can tell the quality is not top notch like other products but for the price it will do
customer_reviews.text: you can tell the quality is not top notch like other products but for the price it will do. if i had to wear them all day they become unconfrontable after about 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: cajunbln

customer_reviews.title: I recommend buying al east 1/2 to 1 shoe size bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: First size was too tight (12), so I had to buy a 13. I recommend buying al east 1/2 to 1 shoe size bigger than your (anyone's) normal shoe size. Very comfortable and light-weight, for me at least.
customer_reviews.author: Zero Type X

customer_reviews.title: Great value shoes - second pair my sons has used
customer_reviews.text: Great value shoes - second pair my sons has used. He outgrew and wore out the first - but 4-5 times per week on the mat for almost two years, that's great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel B.

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Waste Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: After having these shoes for a month and wearing them only an hour a week, the soles are already coming apart. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: dmp

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: the shoes made it more difficult, not easier, to train, and the soles started peeling off after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Brad Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fit too small. I ordered a full size larger and still too small
customer_reviews.author: Glenda L.

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoes they nice but if you have wide ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes they nice but if you have wide feet they are made for long skinny feet, their Great very light .I'm going too get some leather stretch spray and see if that helps .
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: They fell apart after four uses
customer_reviews.text: I used them about 4 times total, for about 4 hours, and the bottom sole of one shoe has already come off. I was willing to put up with the poor quality over time, but I just got these shoes. They still are new!
customer_reviews.author: D. M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are terrible ! Almost impossible to get on cuz they dont offer a medium width . Didnt keep them long enough to find out if the soles come unglued !
customer_reviews.author: nick s.

product_meta.title: MASTERLINE Turf Martial Arts Shoes (Black)
product_meta.description:
TURF MARTIAL ARTS SHOES (BLACK)

SIZING HAS BEEN UPDATED. ALL SHOES ARE NOW IN CORRECT US MENS SIZES.

* Listed in US men's sizes. Women should order 1 size down.
* Turf Martial Arts Shoe
* Laceless slip-on style
* Multiple stitching at stress points
* Maximum durability for rigorous training and competition
* High performance shoes with excellent workmanship and maximum durability.
* This uniquely designed shoe features a raised heel and laceless slip-on design.
* The superior workmanship and multiple stitching throughout
* stress points guarantee high performance and long lasting quality.
* Made of synthetic leather
* Affordably priced
* Color black.
feature_bullets: * Listed in US men's sizes. Women should order 1 size down.
High performance shoes with excellent workmanship and maximum durability.
The superior workmanship and multiple stitching throughout
